body_html:
@peterjc123 I didn't got your point

If you stick to use the first environment, you should list the dirs of it in front of those of the Anaconda environment.
What does it means?
Anaconda is something that I have I stalled after no solution available for my previous problem. But I am not using anaconda anyways. I just kept Anaconda in case if nothing worked then I need to go on for Anaconda which is not my choice to do work. I try to keep everything in the local environment then to go for a virtual env.

body:
@peterjc123  I didn't got your point 

> If you stick to use the first environment, you should list the dirs of it in front of those of the Anaconda environment.
What does it means?
Anaconda is something that I have I stalled after no solution available for my previous problem. But I am not using anaconda anyways. I just kept Anaconda in case if nothing worked then I need to go on for Anaconda which is not my choice to do work. I try to keep everything in the local environment then to go for a virtual env.
